Pre-Game Insights: JJ Redick has given Anthony Davis the green light to shoot from deep
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis is now 2-for-8 from deep in two preseason games
Anthony Davis has been cleared to launch a few feet from behind the arc when he is comfortable taking the shot
Others: The Lakers, 0-2 in the preseason, hoped to enter the win column on the road
The game was between the LA Lakers and the Milwaukee Bucks on October 10, 2024
